biography:
is an American professional wrestler. He was best known for his run as a jobber in the World Wrestling Federation from 1987 to 1992.

Costello's most memorable match during his WWF run was against Andre the Giant, which took place during a March 1988 television taping for WWF Superstars of Wrestling. The match – merely a setup to have Hacksaw Jim Duggan come to the ring, confront Andre and begin their feud – lasted less than 30 seconds, and involved Andre simply grabbing Costello and headbutting him twice before throwing him from the ring.
name: Brian Costello
